title: Can't login to my other account
body: i can't login to my older account called Cyberhound09 for some reason it says the password is wrong

replies.body:
Hey there,

As stated below, it sounds like you got the password wrong.

If you have access to the email address associated with the account you can go through the "[Forgot your password](https://account.leagueoflegends.com/oce/en/forgot-password)" process to reset the account password.

If you no longer have access to the email associated with the account you'll need to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) to Player Support as they're the only ones able to assist with account related issues.
maybe u got the password wrong?
